Diana Francis (amụrụ na 1944 na Lancashire) bụ onye Britain na-ahụ maka udo, Quaker, na onye edemede.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Oxford, ma nwee Ph.D
na Mahadum Bath, nwetara na 1998 na thesis Respect in cross-cultural conflict resolving training
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke International Fellowship of Reconciliation na Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii maka Nkwado Mgbanwe Agha, ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi Swarthmore nke afọ 2015.
